name: NYDailyNews
text:
How the Nets are preparing their new signings for the NBA restart in Orlando

Getting in game shape is a challenge for all of the NBA. The league suspended its season on March 11 and shut down team practice facilities. @Krisplashed @NYDNSports
https://t.co/IHpMK6Y2Hc

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Rep. Glenn Grothman (R-Wisc.) coughed so hard while introducing Trump at a mask-optional GOP event he loosened his tie.

“Let’s talk about Donald John Trump,” he said, before hacking. More than 300 attended.

Wisc. has 39,000+ confirmed cases, ~830 deaths.
https://t.co/WYqPhuCbWu

name: NYDailyNews
text:
MTA officials formed a task force to address poor accommodations for pregnant transit workers.

This comes after a conductor gave birth to a stillborn baby after being switched to working at a rail yard. The task force does not yet include union leaders.
https://t.co/oedscbDZxy

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A violent vandal kicks out windows on two subway car doors in Brooklyn, as the MTA sees a spree of broken glass on trains in an unsettling trend.
https://t.co/RK8tkYNLMJ

name: NYDailyNews
text: RT @DeeshaThosar: Mets notes: Melky Cabrera happy to be playing in New York again, an update on Robinson Cano’s mystery absence from camp (including Melky’s communication with him) and Chili Davis’ work-from-home routine. https://t.co/dgPzr6NCIR

name: NYDailyNews
text:
MTA cops talked down a distraught man waving a gun at the LIRR’s Jamaica Station after a 45-minute standoff.

Lt. Francis Zairo, 65, a transit cop for nearly 39 years, set to retire this month, got a report of a man with his legs hanging over the platform.
https://t.co/bP3XmtM1qw

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Florida reported ~15,300 new cases of coronavirus, breaking the national record for a single-day total.
— 45 deaths, 514 this week, 4,300 total
—11.3% infection rate; 39 median age
—85% ICU beds full
"That’s how hospitals normally run,” Gov. DeSantis said 
https://t.co/mj3N7YAdyK

name: NYDailyNews
text:
ALLAN WERNICK | What F-1 international students need to know under Trump’s new rules

The Trump administration is trying to force colleges and universities to reopen prematurely, impacting our 1M+ international students

@awernick has what you need to know
